column5: GF & I went to a small lake today where I keep a 12ft stashed,We allways catch lots of these little pan sized fish,sometimes 1 or 2 bigger but allways get more than enough for a fish fry.In the 3 or 4 yrs I have been going to this lake we have only shared the lake about 3 times.It takes me about 1/2 hour from home,some hwy some old logging road.The lake is small so I use my electric,easy to get to the boat with my quad.     GF shot this pic of a nesting Loon
nice wish I had a lake near by like that
Wow what a perfect setup.  I'm starting to hate you guys that live up north.
Wait a minute..........   I know exactly where that is!  So it's YOUR BOAT I have been using all this time.
I do it's called rice but I share sort of.
Nice catch Blue ! It's making me hungry.
Sorry Goys,I just had to add this
Great stuff Blue Lk.  certainly the way to do it...small boat stashed on a puddle somewhere sounds good to me.  great pic of the Loon nesting
